verses.verse: This is the blessing, <WH1293> with which Moses <WH4872> the man <WH376> of God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> before <WH6440> his death. <WH4194>

He said, <WH559> "Yahweh <WH3068> came <WH935> from Sinai, <WH5514> And rose <WH2224> from Seir <WH8165> to them. <WH3313> He shone forth from Mount <WH2022> Paran. <WH6290> He came <WH857> from the ten thousands <WH7233> of holy ones. <WH6944> At his right hand <WH3225> was a fiery <WH799> law for them. <WH1881>
Yes, <WH637> he loves <WH2245> the people. <WH5971> All his saints <WH6918> are in your hand. <WH3027> They sat down <WH8497> at your feet; <WH7272> each receives <WH5375> your words. <WH1703>
Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> us a law, <WH8451> An inheritance <WH4181> for the assembly <WH6952> of Jacob. <WH3290>
He was king <WH4428> in Jeshurun, <WH3484> When the heads <WH7218> of the people <WH5971> were gathered, <WH622> All the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> together. <WH3162>
"Let Reuben <WH7205> live, <WH2421> and not die; <WH4191> Nor let his men <WH4962> be few. <WH4557>"

This is for Judah. <WH3063> He said, <WH559> "Hear, <WH8085> Yahweh, <WH3068> the voice <WH6963> of Judah. <WH3063> Bring <WH935> him in to his people. <WH5971> With his hands <WH3027> he contended <WH7227> for himself. <WH5828> You shall be a help against his adversaries. <WH6862>"

Of Levi <WH3878> he said, <WH559> "Your Thummim <WH8550> and your Urim <WH224> are with your godly <WH2623> one, <WH376> whom you proved <WH5254> at Massah, <WH4532> with whom you strove <WH7378> at the waters <WH4325> of Meribah; <WH4809>

who said <WH559> of his father, <WH1> and of his mother, <WH517> <WH7200> 'I have not seen him; <WH5234>' Neither did he acknowledge his brothers, <WH251> Nor did he know <WH3045> his own children: <WH1121> For they have observed <WH8104> your word, <WH565> and keep <WH5341> your covenant. <WH1285>

They shall teach <WH3384> Jacob <WH3290> your ordinances, <WH4941> and Israel <WH3478> your law. <WH8451> They shall put <WH7760> incense <WH6988> before <WH639> you, <WH3632> and whole burnt offering on your altar. <WH4196>

Yahweh, <WH3068> bless <WH1288> his substance. <WH2428> Accept <WH7521> the work <WH6467> of his hands. <WH3027> Strike <WH4272> through the hips <WH4975> of those who rise <WH6965> up against him, <WH8130> of those who hate him, <WH4480> that they not rise <WH6965> again. <WH6965>"

Of Benjamin <WH1144> he said, <WH559> "The beloved <WH3039> of Yahweh <WH3068> shall dwell <WH7931> in safety <WH983> by him. <WH2653> He covers him all the day <WH3117> long. <WH7931> He dwells between his shoulders. <WH3802>"

Of Joseph <WH3130> he said, <WH559> "His land <WH776> is blessed <WH1288> by Yahweh, <WH3068> for the precious things <WH4022> of the heavens, <WH8064> for the dew, <WH2919> for the deep <WH8415> that couches beneath, <WH7257>
for the precious <WH4022> things of the fruits <WH8393> of the sun, <WH8121> for the precious things <WH4022> of the growth <WH1645> of the moons, <WH3391>
for the chief things <WH7218> of the ancient <WH6924> mountains, <WH2042> for the precious things <WH4022> of the everlasting <WH5769> hills, <WH1389>

for the precious things <WH4022> of the earth <WH776> and its fullness, <WH4393> the good will <WH7522> of him who lived <WH7931> in the bush. <WH5572> Let this come <WH935> on the head <WH7218> of Joseph, <WH3130> on the crown of the head <WH6936> of him who was separate <WH5139> from his brothers. <WH251>

The firstborn <WH1060> of his herd, <WH7794> majesty <WH1926> is his. <WH7161> His horns are the horns <WH7161> of the wild ox. <WH7214> With them he shall push <WH5055> all <WH3162> of the peoples, <WH5971> to the ends <WH657> of the earth: <WH776> They are the ten thousands <WH7233> of Ephraim. <WH669> They are the thousands <WH505> of Manasseh. <WH4519>"
Of Zebulun <WH2074> he said, <WH559> "Rejoice, <WH8055> Zebulun, <WH2074> in your going out; <WH3318> and Issachar, <WH3485> in your tents. <WH168>

They shall call <WH7121> the peoples <WH5971> to the mountain. <WH2022> There they will offer <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> of righteousness, <WH6664> for they shall draw <WH3243> out the abundance <WH8228> of the seas, <WH3220> the hidden <WH2934> treasures <WH8226> of the sand. <WH2344>"

Of Gad <WH1410> he said, <WH559> "He who enlarges <WH7337> Gad <WH1410> is blessed. <WH1288> He dwells <WH7931> as a lioness, <WH3833> and tears <WH2963> the arm, <WH2220> yes, <WH637> the crown of the head. <WH6936>

He provided <WH7200> the first part <WH7225> for himself, <WH2710> for there was the lawgiver's portion <WH2513> reserved. <WH5603> He came <WH857> with the heads <WH7218> of the people. <WH5971> He executed <WH6213> the righteousness <WH6666> of Yahweh, <WH3068> His ordinances <WH4941> with Israel. <WH3478>"
Of Dan <WH1835> he said, <WH559> "Dan <WH1835> is a lion <WH738>'s cub <WH1482> that leaps <WH2187> out of Bashan. <WH1316>"

Of Naphtali <WH5321> he said, <WH559> "Naphtali, <WH5321> satisfied <WH7649> with favor, <WH7522> full <WH4392> of the blessing <WH1293> of Yahweh, <WH3068> Possess <WH3423> the west <WH3220> and the south. <WH1864>"

Of Asher <WH836> he said, <WH559> "Asher <WH836> is blessed <WH1288> with children. <WH1121> Let him be acceptable <WH7521> to his brothers. <WH251> Let him dip <WH2881> his foot <WH7272> in oil. <WH8081>
Your bars <WH4515> shall be iron <WH1270> and brass. <WH5178> As your days, <WH3117> so your strength will be. <WH1679>
"There is none like God, <WH410> Jeshurun, <WH3484> who rides <WH7392> on the heavens <WH8064> for your help, <WH5828> In his excellency <WH1346> on the skies. <WH7834>

The eternal <WH6924> God <WH430> is your dwelling <WH4585> place. <WH5769> Underneath are the everlasting arms. <WH2220> He thrust out <WH1644> the enemy <WH341> from before <WH6440> you, <WH559> and said, <WH8045> 'Destroy!'

Israel <WH3478> dwells <WH7931> in safety; <WH983> the fountain <WH5869> of Jacob <WH3290> alone, <WH910> In a land <WH776> of grain <WH1715> and new wine. <WH8492> Yes, <WH8064> his heavens drop down <WH6201> dew. <WH2919>

You are happy, <WH835> Israel. <WH3478> Who is like you, <WH5971> a people saved <WH3467> by Yahweh, <WH3068> the shield <WH4043> of your help, <WH5828> the sword <WH2719> of your excellency! <WH1346> Your enemies <WH341> shall submit <WH3584> themselves to you. <WH1869> You shall tread on their high places. <WH1116>"
